game.name: Box Maze 2 : Agent Cubert
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Jump back into Cubert's life! After saving his girlfriend from Red, he joins the S.S.B. (Secret Services of Boxes). Your first mission as Agent Cubert is to rescue Gaston's daughter. Navigate 100 exciting levels, avoid hazards and enemies, and collect pizzas, sweets, and jellies to boost your score!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Jump back into Cubert's life! After saving his girlfriend from Red, he joins the S.S.B. (Secret Services of Boxes). Your first mission as Agent Cubert is to rescue Gaston's daughter. Navigate 100 exciting levels, avoid hazards and enemies, and collect pizzas, sweets, and jellies to boost your score!
